org.corfudb.runtime

Class RebootUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.corfudb.runtime.RebootUtil

  • public class RebootUtil
extends Object
    Utility to Reboot a server which includes reset or restart Reset wipes out all existing Corfu data while restart does not.

    Created by WenbinZhu on 4/18/19.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void reset(String endpoint, CorfuRuntime.CorfuRuntimeParameters corfuRuntimeParameters, int retries, Duration retryDuration)
      Resets the given server.
      static void reset(String endpoint, int retries, Duration retryDuration)
      Resets the given server.
      static void restart(String endpoint, CorfuRuntime.CorfuRuntimeParameters corfuRuntimeParameters, int retries, Duration retryDuration)
      Restarts the given server.
      static void restart(String endpoint, int retries, Duration retryDuration)
      Restarts the given server.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • reset

        public static void reset(@NonNull
                         String endpoint,
                         int retries,
                         @NonNull
                         Duration retryDuration)
        Resets the given server. Attempts to reset a server finite number of times. Note: reset will wipe out all existing Corfu data. If the retries are exhausted, the utility throws the responsible exception.
        Parameters:
        endpoint - endpoint of the server to reset
        retries - Number of retries to bootstrap each node before giving up.
        retryDuration - Duration between retries.

      • reset

        public static void reset(@NonNull
                         String endpoint,
                         @NonNull
                         CorfuRuntime.CorfuRuntimeParameters corfuRuntimeParameters,
                         int retries,
                         @NonNull
                         Duration retryDuration)
        Resets the given server. Attempts to reset a server finite number of times. Note: reset will wipe out all existing Corfu data. If the retries are exhausted, the utility throws the responsible exception.
        Parameters:
        endpoint - endpoint of the server to reset
        corfuRuntimeParameters - CorfuRuntimeParameters can specify security parameters.
        retries - Number of retries to bootstrap each node before giving up.
        retryDuration - Duration between retries.

      • restart

        public static void restart(@NonNull
                           String endpoint,
                           int retries,
                           @NonNull
                           Duration retryDuration)
        Restarts the given server. Attempts to restart a server finite number of times. Note: restart will NOT wipe out any existing data. If the retries are exhausted, the utility throws the responsible exception.
        Parameters:
        endpoint - endpoint of the server to reset
        retries - Number of retries to bootstrap each node before giving up.
        retryDuration - Duration between retries.

      • restart

        public static void restart(@NonNull
                           String endpoint,
                           @NonNull
                           CorfuRuntime.CorfuRuntimeParameters corfuRuntimeParameters,
                           int retries,
                           @NonNull
                           Duration retryDuration)
        Restarts the given server. Attempts to restart a server finite number of times. Note: restart will NOT wipe out any existing data. If the retries are exhausted, the utility throws the responsible exception.
        Parameters:
        endpoint - endpoint of the server to reset
        corfuRuntimeParameters - CorfuRuntimeParameters can specify security parameters.
        retries - Number of retries to bootstrap each node before giving up.
        retryDuration - Duration between retries.
